page.title: 06ELIZABETH'S SHEARING DAY
page.content: ONE OF THE BUSIEST DAYS ON THE FARM IS SHEARING DAY. MY TWO BROTHERS WENT TO GATHER SHEEP ON THEIR MOTORBIKES.THE LAMBS WERE SEPARATED FROM THE SHEEP AND THEN DIPPED TO PROTECT THEM FROM INFECTION.MONDAY CAME AND SO HAD THE SHEARERS. 6 MEN AND 1 LADY CAME TO HELP US.THEY STARTED WORK AT 8 AM AND BEGAN TO SHEAR A LOT OF SHEEP AND A FEW RAMS.AT 9.30 A.M MY MOTHER CALLED US TO THE HOUSE FOR FOOD.BOTH MY GRANDMOTHERS WERE IN THE HOUSE HELPING MY MOTHER ,THEY ALWAYS ENJOY THIS SPECIAL DAY .LUNCH WAS AT 12.30 P.M AND WAS A LARGE MEAL.BY 5 P.M THE SHEARERS HAD FINISHED AND WE HAD A SMALL MEAL. I ENJOYED MY DAY HELPING MY FATHER TO WRAP THE FLEECES AND CLEAN THE FLOOR FOR THE SHEARERS.AFTER THE SHEARERS HAD LEFT I HELPED TAKE THE SHEEP AND LAMBS BACK TO THE HILL.
